 *Churches located in several Orthodox neighborhoods in Jerusalem complained that neighbors had thrown garbage into their yards.
 
 On Sunday (Oct. 17), Israel's Knesset held an emergency meeting and launched an investigation into the apparently rising level of assaults against Christian clergy and churches.
